trans-unit.source: Get started: Provision a SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Get started: Provision a SQL Data Warehouse | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Provision a SQL Data Warehouse by following these steps and guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Provision a SQL Data Warehouse by following these steps and guidelines.

trans-unit.source: Get started: Provision a SQL Data Warehouse
trans-unit.target: Get started: Provision a SQL Data Warehouse

trans-unit.source: This article is an accelerated guide to help you provision a SQL Data Warehouse in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This article is an accelerated guide to help you provision a SQL Data Warehouse in Azure.

trans-unit.source: By following this guide, you will perform these tasks:
trans-unit.target: By following this guide, you will perform these tasks:

trans-unit.source: Create a new SQL Data Warehouse database.
trans-unit.target: Create a new SQL Data Warehouse database.

trans-unit.source: Configure a new logical server.
trans-unit.target: Configure a new logical server.

trans-unit.source: Set an Azure firewall rule to enable external client access.
trans-unit.target: Set an Azure firewall rule to enable external client access.

trans-unit.source: Azure free trial
trans-unit.target: Azure free trial

trans-unit.source: You will need to have an Azure subscription to complete the following tasks.
trans-unit.target: You will need to have an Azure subscription to complete the following tasks.

trans-unit.source: If you do not already have access to an Azure subscription then resolving this is actually your first step!
trans-unit.target: If you do not already have access to an Azure subscription then resolving this is actually your first step!

trans-unit.source: You can get access to a <link><linkText>free trial[]</linkText><title></title></link> that allows you to try any of the services in Azure, including SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: You can get access to a <link><linkText>free trial[]</linkText><title></title></link> that allows you to try any of the services in Azure, including SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Log in to the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: Once you have a subscription you can log in to the <link><linkText>Azure portal[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Once you have a subscription you can log in to the <link><linkText>Azure portal[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Go ahead and sign in now.
trans-unit.target: Go ahead and sign in now.

trans-unit.source: In this next series of steps we will quickly spin up a brand new logical server and create a new SQL Data Warehouse database.
trans-unit.target: In this next series of steps we will quickly spin up a brand new logical server and create a new SQL Data Warehouse database.

trans-unit.source: Locate the SQL Data Warehouse service
trans-unit.target: Locate the SQL Data Warehouse service

trans-unit.source: The first thing we have to do is locate the SQL Data Warehouse service in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: The first thing we have to do is locate the SQL Data Warehouse service in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: In the bottom left corner of the Azure Portal is the new button.
trans-unit.target: In the bottom left corner of the Azure Portal is the new button.

trans-unit.source: The new button is the starting point for creating any new service within Azure.
trans-unit.target: The new button is the starting point for creating any new service within Azure.

trans-unit.source: Click the new button now.
trans-unit.target: Click the new button now.

trans-unit.source: Data + Storage
trans-unit.target: Data + Storage

trans-unit.source: Clicking the new button has opened up all the service categories within Azure.
trans-unit.target: Clicking the new button has opened up all the service categories within Azure.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse lives in the "Data + Storage" category.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse lives in the "Data + Storage" category.

trans-unit.source: Click Data + Storage to drill in and see the services offered by Azure for this category.
trans-unit.target: Click Data + Storage to drill in and see the services offered by Azure for this category.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse

trans-unit.source: As you can see Azure offers lots of data and storage engines.
trans-unit.target: As you can see Azure offers lots of data and storage engines.

trans-unit.source: However, this getting started guide is for SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: However, this getting started guide is for SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Go ahead and select SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: Go ahead and select SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Configure SQL Data Warehouse
trans-unit.target: Configure SQL Data Warehouse

trans-unit.source: To complete the provisioning process simply configure SQL Data Warehouse.
trans-unit.target: To complete the provisioning process simply configure SQL Data Warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Database name
trans-unit.target: Database name

trans-unit.source: The first configuration is to name the database.
trans-unit.target: The first configuration is to name the database.

trans-unit.source: For this quick start, name the database "MySQLDW".
trans-unit.target: For this quick start, name the database "MySQLDW".

trans-unit.source: When you create your own database you can of course name it as you wish.
trans-unit.target: When you create your own database you can of course name it as you wish.

trans-unit.source: However, it does need to conform to the basic naming requirements of Azure.
trans-unit.target: However, it does need to conform to the basic naming requirements of Azure.

trans-unit.source: Performance
trans-unit.target: Performance

trans-unit.source: The performance option is an important one.
trans-unit.target: The performance option is an important one.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse provides scalable power via this slider.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse provides scalable power via this slider.

trans-unit.source: You can increase or decrease your performance at any time - not just when you configure the data warehouse.
trans-unit.target: You can increase or decrease your performance at any time - not just when you configure the data warehouse.

trans-unit.source: The further you slide to the right the greater the resources at your disposal.
trans-unit.target: The further you slide to the right the greater the resources at your disposal.

trans-unit.source: If those resources are no longer needed then you can immediately move the slider back; saving on cost.
trans-unit.target: If those resources are no longer needed then you can immediately move the slider back; saving on cost.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse lets you change your performance profile on demand without having to re-create the data warehouse or move data.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse lets you change your performance profile on demand without having to re-create the data warehouse or move data.

trans-unit.source: Use the slider now to see how the data warehouse units increase as you slide to the right and decrease as you move back to the left.
trans-unit.target: Use the slider now to see how the data warehouse units increase as you slide to the right and decrease as you move back to the left.

trans-unit.source: Before leaving this step make sure you have returned the slider back to the left.
trans-unit.target: Before leaving this step make sure you have returned the slider back to the left.

trans-unit.source: Your new data warehouse is small, so we don't need too much; save your resources for the rest of your trial!
trans-unit.target: Your new data warehouse is small, so we don't need too much; save your resources for the rest of your trial!

trans-unit.source: Select source
trans-unit.target: Select source

trans-unit.source: This option gives the choice of starting with an empty database.
trans-unit.target: This option gives the choice of starting with an empty database.

trans-unit.source: Choose your new database as the starting point.
trans-unit.target: Choose your new database as the starting point.

trans-unit.source: A second option is also available.
trans-unit.target: A second option is also available.

trans-unit.source: It is also permissible to create the database from a pre-existing restore point; a restore option.
trans-unit.target: It is also permissible to create the database from a pre-existing restore point; a restore option.

trans-unit.source: Logical server
trans-unit.target: Logical server

trans-unit.source: Your new SQL Data Warehouse database resides on a logical server.
trans-unit.target: Your new SQL Data Warehouse database resides on a logical server.

trans-unit.source: The logical server brings consistency of configuration for a number of databases and locates the service to an Azure data center.
trans-unit.target: The logical server brings consistency of configuration for a number of databases and locates the service to an Azure data center.

trans-unit.source: The options that need to be set are:
trans-unit.target: The options that need to be set are:

trans-unit.source: Server Name
trans-unit.target: Server Name

trans-unit.source: Server Admin Name
trans-unit.target: Server Admin Name

trans-unit.source: Password
trans-unit.target: Password

trans-unit.source: Data Center Location
trans-unit.target: Data Center Location

trans-unit.source: Permission for Azure services to access the server
trans-unit.target: Permission for Azure services to access the server

trans-unit.source: Feel free to set these values as you see fit.
trans-unit.target: Feel free to set these values as you see fit.

trans-unit.source: The Server name has to be unique.
trans-unit.target: The Server name has to be unique.

trans-unit.source: It's a good idea to pick a data center that is close to you to reduce network latency.
trans-unit.target: It's a good idea to pick a data center that is close to you to reduce network latency.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse also contains powerful features that leverage Azure's other services.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse also contains powerful features that leverage Azure's other services.

trans-unit.source: It is therefore a good idea to leave the check box enabled for Azure services access.
trans-unit.target: It is therefore a good idea to leave the check box enabled for Azure services access.

trans-unit.source: SQL Data Warehouse must use a V12 Server.
trans-unit.target: SQL Data Warehouse must use a V12 Server.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that this option is set to YES.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that this option is set to YES.

trans-unit.source: The logical server can also be shared by Azure SQL Databases and SQL Data Warehouse databases.
trans-unit.target: The logical server can also be shared by Azure SQL Databases and SQL Data Warehouse databases.

trans-unit.source: However, it must be a V12 Server.
trans-unit.target: However, it must be a V12 Server.

trans-unit.source: Record the server name, server admin name and password somewhere and keep them safe.
trans-unit.target: Record the server name, server admin name and password somewhere and keep them safe.

trans-unit.source: You will need this information to connect to the SQL Data Warehouse database.
trans-unit.target: You will need this information to connect to the SQL Data Warehouse database.

trans-unit.source: Resource group
trans-unit.target: Resource group

trans-unit.source: Resource groups are containers designed to help you manage a collection of Azure resources.
trans-unit.target: Resource groups are containers designed to help you manage a collection of Azure resources.

trans-unit.source: For this quick start it is ok to leave resource group configured on its default values.
trans-unit.target: For this quick start it is ok to leave resource group configured on its default values.

trans-unit.source: Learn more about <link><linkText>resource groups</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Learn more about <link><linkText>resource groups</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Subscription
trans-unit.target: Subscription

trans-unit.source: A single user could have one or more Azure subscriptions.
trans-unit.target: A single user could have one or more Azure subscriptions.

trans-unit.source: If you have more than one subscription associated with your login then you can choose which subscription to use.
trans-unit.target: If you have more than one subscription associated with your login then you can choose which subscription to use.

trans-unit.source: However, for the purposes of this guide, the default should be fine.
trans-unit.target: However, for the purposes of this guide, the default should be fine.

trans-unit.source: Let's go and create the SQL Data Warehouse!
trans-unit.target: Let's go and create the SQL Data Warehouse!

trans-unit.source: Create your data warehouse
trans-unit.target: Create your data warehouse

trans-unit.source: All that is left for creating your data warehouse is to click the create button.
trans-unit.target: All that is left for creating your data warehouse is to click the create button.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations!
trans-unit.target: Congratulations!

trans-unit.source: You have created your first SQL Data Warehouse database.
trans-unit.target: You have created your first SQL Data Warehouse database.

trans-unit.source: You should now be returned to the <link><linkText>Azure portal[]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: You should now be returned to the <link><linkText>Azure portal[]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Notice that your SQL Data Warehouse database has been added to the page.
trans-unit.target: Notice that your SQL Data Warehouse database has been added to the page.

trans-unit.source: At this point no-one can access the SQL Data Warehouse database.
trans-unit.target: At this point no-one can access the SQL Data Warehouse database.

trans-unit.source: To keep everything secure by default the database has not yet been configured for clients to access it.
trans-unit.target: To keep everything secure by default the database has not yet been configured for clients to access it.

trans-unit.source: Therefore the last step in the provisioning process is to configure the service for external access.
trans-unit.target: Therefore the last step in the provisioning process is to configure the service for external access.

trans-unit.source: Configure the Azure firewall
trans-unit.target: Configure the Azure firewall

trans-unit.source: To configure the Azure firewall for the first time:
trans-unit.target: To configure the Azure firewall for the first time:

trans-unit.source: Click Browse in the left navigation blade.
trans-unit.target: Click Browse in the left navigation blade.

trans-unit.source: Choose SQL Servers.
trans-unit.target: Choose SQL Servers.

trans-unit.source: Select your logical SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: Select your logical SQL Server.

trans-unit.source: Choose settings.
trans-unit.target: Choose settings.

trans-unit.source: Click Firewall.
trans-unit.target: Click Firewall.

trans-unit.source: Set your firewall rule.
trans-unit.target: Set your firewall rule.

trans-unit.source: There are a couple of things for you to do here.
trans-unit.target: There are a couple of things for you to do here.

trans-unit.source: They are:
trans-unit.target: They are:

trans-unit.source: Name your firewall rule.
trans-unit.target: Name your firewall rule.

trans-unit.source: Provide an IP range if you do not have a static IP address.
trans-unit.target: Provide an IP range if you do not have a static IP address.

trans-unit.source: The client IP address range you need to include is your external or publicly facing IP address.To find your external IP address you can use a number of websites such as <html></html>www.whatismyip.com<html></html>
trans-unit.target: The client IP address range you need to include is your external or publicly facing IP address.To find your external IP address you can use a number of websites such as <html></html>www.whatismyip.com<html></html>

trans-unit.source: Save your firewall rule.
trans-unit.target: Save your firewall rule.

trans-unit.source: Now that you have configured the firewall you will be able to make connections from your desktop to the Azure SQL Data Warehouse you just created.
trans-unit.target: Now that you have configured the firewall you will be able to make connections from your desktop to the Azure SQL Data Warehouse you just created.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: Now the SQL Data Warehouse service has been successfully provisioned we can move on to learn how to use it.
trans-unit.target: Now the SQL Data Warehouse service has been successfully provisioned we can move on to learn how to use it.

trans-unit.source: The next steps are therefore to learn how to:
trans-unit.target: The next steps are therefore to learn how to:

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Connect and query[]</linkText><title></title></link> the data warehouse.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Connect and query[]</linkText><title></title></link> the data warehouse.

trans-unit.source: Load [sample data].
trans-unit.target: Load [sample data].
